data.meta_description: Learn about Ken Lerner on Apple TV. Browse shows and movies that include Ken Lerner including RoboCop 2, Senseless and more.
data.text:
Bloodbath

A stalker begins targeting Abby, and the team shoots into protective overdrive to track down the person who wants her dead.

1. Scarlet Ribbons

Jane holds a smoking gun, having shot dead the man he believes to be his nemesis, the serial killer Red John.

Baseball Was Better With Steroids

Charlie questions his relationship with Chelsea after Mia returns; a labouring Judith is rushed to hospital.

The Re-Entry Minimization

Wolowitz is disappointed when he doesn't receive a hero's welcome on his return from space. Meanwhile, Bernadette is out of action with a heavy cold.
